Class Bus

java.lang.Object
microsim.simulation.component.SimulationComponent
microsim.simulation.component.Bus
public class Bus extends SimulationComponent
Represents a communication bus for a simulation. A bus is comprised of:
  • A 16 bit address line.
  • A 16 bit data line.
  • Control lines (active high):
    • Read enable line.
    • Write enable line.
    • Target space line. Low is memory, high is I/O space.
Lines are implemented by TSLine objects, modeling 3-state logic.
